select vp.status , count(vp.status) as count from video_publish vp , category c where vp.category=c.id and c.status='normal'
and (c.id = #{category} or c.parent = #{category})
and vp.title like "%"#{title}"%"
group by status

select count(*) from video_publish vp,category cat,resource re,sys_user su where vp.category=cat.id and vp.cover=re.id and vp.creator=su.id
and vp.id = #{id}
and vp.title like "%"#{title}"%"
and vp.short_title like "%"#{shortTitle}"%"
and (vp.category = #{category} or cat.parent = #{category})
and vp.status = #{status}
and cat.scode like "%"#{scode}"%"
mapper.update: update video_publish set status='deleted' where id=#{id}
